tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WirelessConfigurations ( 
    protocol_name TEXT, 
    encryption_type TEXT, 
    frequency_range TEXT, 
    max_bandwidth INT, 
    PRIMARY KEY (protocol_name) 
);

CREATE TABLE wifi_networks (
    ssid STRING PRIMARY KEY,
    password STRING,
    encryption_type STRING,
    channel INT
)

CREATE TABLE bluetooth_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name STRING,
    pairing_code STRING,
    device_type STRING,
    is_connected BOOL
)

CREATE TABLE zigbee_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name STRING,
    network_id INT,
    battery_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE wifi_networks (
  network_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ssid VARCHAR(255),
  password VARCHAR(255),
  security_protocol VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE bluetooth_devices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  paired BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE zigbee_networks (
  network_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  coordinator_id INT,
  network_key VARCHAR(255),
  channel_number INT
)

CREATE TABLE lora_devices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  device_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE 5g_networks (
  network_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider VARCHAR(255),
  bandwidth INT,
  encryption_algorithm VARCHAR(50)
)
